name: contest-organizer
description: Tool to organize & enjoy your sport contest.

scripts.oldprod-update-paths: npm run oldprod-setSrcBasePath && npm run oldprod-setHrefBasePath
scripts.pre-prod: npm run build && npm run pre-prod-only
scripts.pre-prod-only: npm run pre-prod-backup-api && npm run build && npm run pre-prod-clean && npm run pre-prod-push && npm run pre-prod-update-paths && npm run pre-prod-restore-api
scripts.pre-prod-restore-api: cp -r ~/backup/contest-api-pre-prod/api /var/www/marius.click/html/contest-preprod/ && cp -r ~/backup/contest-api-pre-prod/data/* /var/www/marius.click/html/contest-preprod/api/data/ && npm run pre-prod-api-group && npm run pre-prod-api-rights-grw
scripts.pre-prod-update-paths: npm run pre-prod-setSrcBasePath && npm run pre-prod-setHrefBasePath
scripts.backup: npm run oldprod-clean && npm run oldprod-push && npm run oldprod-update-paths && npm run backup-api-data && npm run backup-api && npm run oldprod-api-group && npm run oldprod-api-rights-grw
scripts.prod-update-paths: npm run setSrcBasePath && npm run setHrefBasePath
scripts.prod: npm run backup && npm run build && npm run prod-only
scripts.prod-only: npm run build && npm run prod-clean && npm run prod-push && npm run prod-update-paths && npm run restore-api
scripts.restore-api: npm run restore-api-files && cp -r ~/backup/contest-data/* /var/www/marius.click/html/contest/api/data/ && npm run restore-api-group && npm run restore-api-rights-grw
